Name: input_struct
Description: Input structure. This is the only positional argument so you can type it first and skip the flag.

Name: input_md
Description: Input file with MD simulation.

Name: config_file
Description: Filename of the configuration file.

Name: include
Description: Coordinates of the included area in PDB format.

Name: output_draw
Description: PDB output filename.

Name: output_vol
Description: Volume output filename.

Name: output_wall
Description: Cavity's wall atoms/residues output filename.

Name: NDD_modes
Description: Input vectors for Non-Delaunay dynamics (NDD).

Name: NDD_frequencies
Description: Input frequencies (in cm^-1) to calculate the flexibility index by NDD.

Name: NDD_scaling
Description: Input scaling factors for NDD. See ANA's manual to understand why you may want to use them.

Name: NDD_size
Description: Scaling magnitude for the input vectors for NDD.

Name: NDD_output
Description: Suffix for the NDD output file. The scaling magnitude will be the prefix.

Name: tool_check_CH
Description: Filename of output PDB displaying the included area. ANA will exit after writing this file and no other calculation will be performed.

Name: tool_pdb_to_ch
Description: Read the input PDB and write 'include.ANA' file with the vertices of its convex hull.

Name: tool_pdb_norm
Description: Read the input PDB and renumber its atoms and residues. Be aware that his tool won't fix every error in your PDB. Writes the output PDB to tool_pdb_norm.

Name: tool_aa_to_ca
Description: Write Calpha atoms indices for the included residues to stdout.

Name: ver
Description: Output version number.

Name: help
Description: Output help message.

Name: included_area_residues
Description: Amino acids that delimit the convex hull of the included area. Numbers from 1 to 9999 separated by commas spaces or tabs.

Name: included_area_atoms
Description: Atoms that delimit the convex hull of the included area. Numbers from 1 to 9999 separated by commas spaces or tabs.

Name: included_area_precision
Description: 0: keep all cells that intersect in the included area. 1: prune the intersecting cells to keep only the voids that lie inside the included area.

Name: sphere
Description: Read the input coordinates and write 'include_sphere.ANA' file with the requested pseudo sphere. Deprecated.

Name: cylinder
Description: Read the input coordinates and write 'include_cylinder.ANA' file with the requested pseudo cylinder. Deprecated.

Name: prism
Description: Read the input coordinates and write 'include_prism.ANA' file with the requested prism. Deprecated.

Name: included_residues
Description: Amino acids that line the desired cavity. Useful for discovering new cavities. Deprecated.

Name: minimum_number_of_vertices_to_include
Description: Minimum number of wall atoms of the included amino acids. Deprecated.

Name: clusters_method
Description: Define the method to clusterize cells. none: don't group null areas. facets: group null areas if the tetrahedrons share facets. boxes: group null areas if the tetrahedrons bounding boxes intersect.

Name: clusters_min_size
Description: Minimum number of cells a cluster has to have to be included.

Name: ASA_discard_method
Description: Method for discarding cells according to solvent exposure. none: don't. cm: determine cells surrondings using the global CM as reference. backbone: draw a convex hull between the Calphas and discard every cell with its centroid outside(inside) the hull. axes: determine cells surrondings using its centroid and cartesian axes as references.

Name: ASA_only_side
Description: Which side to keep. inside: keep inside nulls. outside: keep outside nulls.

Name: ASA_exclude_residues
Description: Residues to exclude from the ASA algorithms.

Name: ASA_min_dot_pdt
Description: Minimum dot product to keep(discard) cell. As it increases more cells are classified as being outside.

Name: ASA_max_dist
Description: Maximum distance between cell and Calpha used to keep cell. The bigger this number is the better (but slower) the process gets.

Name: start
Description: Frame to begin reading at.

Name: step
Description: Step count to read trajectory frames. NetCDF format only.

Name: stop
Description: Frame to stop reading. Reads the whole trajectory when set to 0.

Name: NDD_modes_format
Description: Format of the input vectors. amber: vectors will be read as Amber PCA modes. row: vectors will be read in row major order. column: vectors will be read in column major order.

Name: NDD_particles_per_residue
Description: Number of particles used to represent each residue. ANA currently support these levels of coarse grain: 0: Full atom. NOT YET SUPPORTED. 1: 1 particle per residue (alpha carbon representation). 6: 6 particles per residue: N;CA;C;O;CB;R (side-chain center of mass). Gly and ALA only have 4 and 5 particles respectively. Be sure to check your PDB is properly formatted and atoms are properly ordered. First the heavy atoms starting with N and then the hydrogens starting with H.

Name: NDD_frequences_scaling
Description: If true ANA will scale the input vectors by their frequencies instead of automatically generating its own scaling factors.

Name: NDD_step
Description: Number of steps in the NDD pipeline ANA will perform. 1: ANA will not perform the derivative and instead output 2 files with the volumes of the displaced cavity in the positive and the negative direction. 2: ANA will output the VGV. 3: ANA will output the flexibility index.

Name: output_type
Description: How to visualize output cavities. raw_pdb: null areas as tetrahedrons. raw_cgo: null areas as tetrahedrons formed with CGO lines in a pymol script. grid_pdb: null areas filled with points. grid_cgo: null areas filled with CGO spheres in a pymol script.

Name: sphere_count
Description: Sphere count for grid output.

Name: min_vol_radius
Description: Radius of the sphere with the minimum volume to be taken into account.

Name: max_area_radius
Description: Radius of the sphere with the maximum surface to be taken into account. Deprecated.

Name: atom_only
Description: Triangulate only ATOM records.

Name: list_wall
Description: atom: output a file with the wall atoms. residue: output a file with the wall amino acids. none: don't.

Name: separator
Description: Separator character for wall residues (atoms). +: might useful for pymol.

Name: triangulate_only_included_aas
Description: Instead of triangulating the whole molecule triangulate only the included amino acids. Deprecated.
